org.blockchain_innovation.factom.client.api.log

Interface LogFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SLF4JLogFactoryImpl

    public interface LogFactory
    A logger abstraction (Service Provider Interface), to allow plugging in different logging libraries and not let this library pull in any unwanted logging library.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  LogFactory.Provider
      The SPI work is being done in the provider

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      Gets the engine name of the logger implementation.

      Allows the retrieval of the logger implemententation for the name.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        Logger newInstance(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the logger by name. This is used internally and not called by the end user.
        Parameters:
        name - The logger name.
        Returns:
        The logger connected to the name

      • newInstance

        Logger newInstance(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Gets the logger by class. This is used internally and not called by the end user.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class to retrieve the logger for.
        Returns:
        The logger connected to the class.

      • getEngine

        java.lang.String getEngine()
        Gets the engine name of the logger implementation.
        Returns:

      • getLogger

        static Logger getLogger(java.lang.String name)
        Allows the retrieval of the logger implemententation for the name. This is the logger name and not the SPI engine name! This is the method the end user calls.
        Parameters:
        name - The logger name.
        Returns:
        The logger from the SPI implementation connected to the logger name

      • getLogger

        static Logger getLogger(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Allows the retrieval of the logger implemententation for the name. This is the logger name and not the SPI engine name! This is the method the end user calls.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The logger class.
        Returns:
        The logger from the SPI implementation connected to the logger class
